shortdesc.ph: Sets the spatial audio parameters for a remote user.
Sets the spatial audio parameters for a remote user.
Sets the spatial audio parameters for a remote user.
Sets the spatial audio parameters for a remote user.

p.codeblock: Future<void> setRemoteUserSpatialAudioParams( {required int uid, required SpatialAudioParams params});
public abstract int SetRemoteUserSpatialAudioParams(uint uid, SpatialAudioParams param);

section.p: You must call this method after . After successfully setting the spatial audio parameters for the remote user, the local user hears the remote user with a sense of spatiality.
You need to call this method after . After successfully setting the spatial audio parameters for the remote user, the local user will hear spatial audio effects from the remote user.
This method must be called after . After successfully setting the spatial audio parameters for the remote user, the local user will perceive spatial sound from the remote user.
This method must be called after . After successfully setting the spatial audio parameters for the remote user, the local user will hear the remote user with spatial effects.

plentry.pd: User ID. Must be the same as the user ID used when joining the channel.
User ID. Must be the same as the user ID used when joining the channel.
User ID. Must match the user ID used when joining the channel.
User ID. Must match the user ID used when joining the channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when it fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
